text: József Duró (26 June 1966 – 22 May 2022) was a Hungarian football manager and player. Duró was born in Berettyóújfalu, Hungary. He played for the Hungary national football team twenty-one times from 1990 until 1995. Duró died on 22 May 2022 at the age of 55.Meghalt Dúró József ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Hungarian football managers
title: József Duró
